Compare Blue Blinds

Voile FR Cobalt Blue Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Voile FR Cobalt Blue is a semi-translucent stylish, dark blue roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room.   Our Voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in blue that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame Retardant and Pollergen-coated, makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space. At Swift Direct Blinds, our customers and quality comes first, that's why we offer a five-year guarantee on our made-to-measure blinds. Based in West Yorkshire, our roller blinds are carefully cut and assembled by our expert roller team. Product ID: DB-RBX2059 Fabric Colour: Cobalt Blue Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER1 - Lowest Energy Saving Value - Due to Blind Type or Fabric Light Filtering: Yes Voile FR Cobalt Blue Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £9.20 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

Stockholm Midnight Blue Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Our best-selling Stockholm range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties & in addition to this is also moisture resistant.  This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites.  This rich Midnight Blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dark blue fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary scheme. Our rollers are great for privacy and light control. At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This blue roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Stirlo Royal Blue (Blinds By Post)

Stirlo Royal Blue Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Made to Measure Stirlo Royal Blue Plain Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost

from £7.72
blue blue-roller roller

Our roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring acorn pull which removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Our Splash Indigo Blue roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens. At Swift Direct Blinds, our roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with our high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with our FREE 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in our blinds. Konya Blackout Ink Blue (Blinds By Post)

Konya Blackout Ink Blue Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. Infusion asc Azure Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Infusion asc Azure Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Infusion ASC Azure Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4118. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which improves energy efficiency

Amor Royal Blue with Haze Soft Grey Double Roller Blind (Make My Blinds)

Combining two of our most popular roller blinds in one, this Amor Royal Blue and Haze Soft Grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout Amor soft grey to block out the light. Our double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! This dark Midnight Blue panel blind is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panel blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our panels are great for privacy and light control, especially for large spaces - reaching up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This blue panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

Kingston Royal Blue Pleated Perfect Fit (Make My Blinds)

Create a stunning statement piece out of your windows with Kingston Royal Blue Perfect Fit. The richness of the colour makes this a balancing force in rooms with strongly coloured furnishings, while the dimout fabric still allows some lightflow during the daytime, for a gentle softening effect. The Perfect Fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, making it a great choice for conservatories which often have little wall space. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required Kingston Royal Blue Pleated Perfect Fit
